title: DON'T USE VMWARE FOR PLAYING LEAGUE!
body:
I just wanted to say that I was using a VM to play in euw, so that I could have my main client open for NA(to get messages and such) and apparently you will get permabanned without any warning for doing this.

Any linux users, please tell me what you use to play LoL with.

replies.body: That sounds pretty strange, I'm not sure that using VMWare would warrant getting you banned, and I don't actually see any bans on this account at all. Could you be referring to a different account you have? I'd be more than happy to look into what happened for ya!

Yeah, this is my main account, I played 1 game on my euw account and I noticed that I had around 200 ping, so I decided to kind of forget about it. I'm assuming that my account might have been triggered by some sort of automatic botting prevention because I'm guessing they run a lot of VMs to level their accounts. My euw account has the same username as this one. I'm not that sad about the account being banned, just concerned if other people who might play with their mains and might get banned from it.
